name: Bernard Matteo

descriptions.short: Matteo, 20 years old, student in second year of BUT Informatique at IUT de Lens. Currently in work-study at Lenrek Informatique as a developer.
descriptions.long:
My name is Matteo, I'm 20 years old and I'm a student in second year of BUT Informatique at IUT de Lens. I'm currently in work-study at Lenrek Informatique as a developer. 
 I like to discover and learn new technologies, currently, I'm training in web development, in TypeScript in particular. I plan to train later on the lower level development, in C++ and/or C#.

otherInfos:
I love playing video games, my favorites are Overwatch 2, Hollow Knight and Subnautica. I also like new technologies, and development. 
 I like to listen to all kinds of music. 
 My mother tongue is French, and I have a good level of English.
